item.title: How to Start a Blog (in a Weekend)
item.description: Why Start a Blog? I started my blog for three reasons: to show my work and document my progress, to build authority in my field, and because writing is way easier than creating videos or podcasts. There is a big potential for people to showcase their work: one can learn a lot from a beginner’s process. There are so many ways to stumble upon new topics in ways that experts don’t remember.
